name: Mass Flux
description:
Mass Flux is a tile-based puzzle game about building or separating a mass of block creatures to form a suitable shape to reach or navigate to a goal.

-Made for the 2022 Pirate Software Game Jam- (Theme: Sacrifice is strength)

With a frequently unhelpful shape, there is a necessity to manipulate and sacrifice some impractical cells over spikes to form a more suitable shape. 

Controls

  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
  • R - Reset level
  • ESC - Pause
